response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (22 years old)", "medium", "Young age is associated with higher risk-taking behavior, but at 22 the risk is present without being extreme."],
    ["Criminal History (1 arrest, no conviction)", "low", "A single arrest with no conviction suggests limited prior criminal engagement."],
    ["Ethnicity (Asian/Pacific Islander)", "low", "Research often finds lower recidivism rates among Asian/Pacific Islanders compared to other groups."],
    ["Marital Status and Living Situation (never married, living alone)", "medium", "Lack of close familial or marital ties can reduce social support, elevating risk moderately."],
    ["Educational Status (High school diploma, not in college)", "medium", "Limited higher education opportunities can constrain future prospects but a high school education is a baseline credential."],
    ["Employment Status (no job during the past year)", "high", "Unemployment is a strong risk factor for recidivism due to financial stress and lack of structure."],
    ["Substance Use (no drug use in past 4 years)", "low", "Lack of recent drug use significantly reduces a known recidivism risk factor."],
    ["Mental Health (recent episodes of feeling down)", "medium", "Symptoms of depression, even if intermittent, can negatively affect decision-making and resilience."],
    ["Early Home Environment (lived with both biological parents in an urban household of 5)", "low", "A stable family structure during upbringing is generally protective, though the urban setting can sometimes pose risks."],
    ["Religiosity (believes God has nothing to do with personal events)", "medium", "Absence of religious or spiritual beliefs may reduce access to some forms of community support, thus moderately increasing risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 22-year-old male who identifies himself as Asian / Pacific Islander. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 1 inch and weighs 180 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 5, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
